entry.title: Init(), or the Maiden Post
entry.summary: Welcome, dear reader, to this blog about all kinds of fancy software development techniques. Currently we're diving head first into enabling Continuous Delivery in our teams, which will be the first topic we'll cover in future blog posts.
entry.content: Welcome, dear reader, to this blog about all kinds of fancy software development techniques. Currently we're diving head first into enabling Continuous Delivery in our teams, which will be the first topic we'll cover in future blog posts.
